mapper.select:
SELECT a.employee_id, a.employee_name, a.mobile, a.id_type, a.id_number, a.sex, date_format(a.date_of_birth, '%Y-%m-%d') as date_of_birth, a.birthday, a.email, a.age, a.country, a.nation, a.native_place, a.address, a.highest_education, date_format(a.entry_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as entry_time, a.probation, a.entry_status, date_format(a.become_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as become_time, a.job_number, d.dept_id, d.name as dept_name, c.employee_name as parent_name, a.parent_id, a.post, a.post_level, a.work_address, a.work_detail_address, a.work_city, a.employment_forms, a.status, date_format(a.company_age_start_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as company_age_start_time, a.company_age, e.salary_card_num, e.account_opening_city, e.bank_name, e.opening_bank, g.accumulation_fund_num, g.social_security_num, g.scheme_id, h.value as channelName, f.contract_type, f.contract_num, f.start_time, f.end_time, f.term FROM `wk_hrm_employee` `a` left join `wk_hrm_employee` c on a.parent_id = c.employee_id left join `wk_hrm_dept` d on a.dept_id = d.dept_id left join `wk_hrm_employee_salary_card` e on a.employee_id = e.employee_id left join `wk_hrm_employee_social_security_info` g on a.employee_id = g.employee_id left join wk_hrm_recruit_channel h on a.channel_id = h.channel_id left join `wk_hrm_employee_contract` f on a.employee_id = f.employee_id and f.status = 1 where a.is_del = 0
and a.employee_id in
#{employeeId}
and 1=2
group by a.employee_id
ORDER BY a.${data.sortField}
desc
asc
ORDER BY a.`update_time` desc

select a.employee_id,a.employee_name,a.mobile,a.sex,a.age,a.job_number, a.dept_id,b.name as deptName,a.parent_id,c.employee_name as parnetName, a.post from wk_hrm_employee a left join wk_hrm_dept b on a.dept_id = b.dept_id left join wk_hrm_employee c on a.parent_id = c.employee_id where a.mobile = #{mobile} and a.is_del = 0

select employee_id, employee_name, job_number, a.dept_id,b.name as deptName, post, status, entry_time from wk_hrm_employee a left join wk_hrm_dept b on a.dept_id = b.dept_id where a.employee_id in
#{employeeId}
select employee_id from wk_hrm_employee where year(entry_time) = #{year} and month(entry_time) = #{month} and entry_status = 2 and is_del = 0

select a.employee_id from wk_hrm_employee a left join wk_hrm_employee_quit_info b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id where year(b.plan_quit_time) = #{year} and month(b.plan_quit_time) = #{month} and a.entry_status = 3 and a.is_del = 0
select employee_id from wk_hrm_employee where status = 2 and year(become_time) = year(now()) and month(become_time) = month(now()) and is_del = 0 group by employee_id

select employee_id,age,employee_name from wk_hrm_employee where ((birthday_type = 1 and birthday = #{solarBirthday}) or (birthday_type = 2 and birthday = #{lunarBirthday}) and entry_status in(1,3)) and is_del = 0 and entry_status != 4
and employee_id in
#{employeeId}
and 1=2

select employee_id,employee_name from wk_hrm_employee where to_days(entry_time) = to_days(#{time}) and is_del = 0
and employee_id in
#{employeeId}
and 1=2

select employee_id,employee_name from wk_hrm_employee where to_days(become_time) = to_days(#{time}) and is_del = 0
and employee_id in
#{employeeId}
and 1=2

select a.employee_id,a.employee_name from wk_hrm_employee a inner join wk_hrm_employee_quit_info b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id where to_days(b.plan_quit_time) = to_days(#{time}) and a.entry_status = 3 and a.is_del = 0
and a.employee_id in
#{employeeId}
and 1=2
select employee_name, job_number,mobile,dept_id,post,employment_forms, status,date_format(a.entry_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as entry_time,id_type,id_number from wk_hrm_employee a where 1= 1 and a.is_del = 0

select date_format(entry_time,'%Y-%m-%d') from wk_hrm_employee where entry_time between #{data.startTime} and #{data.endTime} and is_del = 0
and employee_id in
#{employeeId}
and 1=2
group by date_format(entry_time,'%Y-%m-%d')

select date_format(become_time,'%Y-%m-%d') from wk_hrm_employee where become_time between #{data.startTime} and #{data.endTime} and is_del = 0
and employee_id in
#{employeeId}
and 1=2
group by date_format(become_time,'%Y-%m-%d')

select date_format(b.plan_quit_time,'%Y-%m-%d') from wk_hrm_employee a inner join wk_hrm_employee_quit_info b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id where b.plan_quit_time between #{data.startTime} and #{data.endTime} and is_del = 0
and a.employee_id in
#{employeeId}
and 1=2
group by date_format(b.plan_quit_time,'%Y-%m-%d')

if.test: data.status != null and data.status != '' and data.status != 11 and data.status != 12 and data.status != 13 and data.status != 14 and data.status != 15

sql.if: and a.status in (1,2) and a.entry_status in (1,3)

choose.when: and a.employee_id in (select employee_id from wk_hrm_employee_abnormal_change_record where year(change_time) = year(now()) and month(change_time) = month(now()) and type = 1 group by employee_id having max(create_time))

and a.employee_id in (select employee_id from wk_hrm_employee_abnormal_change_record where year(change_time) = year(now()) and month(change_time) = month(now()) and type = 2 group by employee_id having max(create_time))

and a.employee_id in (select employee_id from wk_hrm_employee_abnormal_change_record where year(change_time) = year(now()) and month(change_time) = month(now()) and type = 3 group by employee_id having max(create_time))

and a.employee_id in (select employee_id from wk_hrm_employee_abnormal_change_record where year(change_time) = year(now()) and month(change_time) = month(now()) and type = 4 group by employee_id having max(create_time))
and a.employee_id in (select employee_id from wk_hrm_employee where year(entry_time) = year(now()) and month(entry_time) = month(now()) and entry_status = 2)

and a.employee_id in (select a.employee_id from wk_hrm_employee a left join wk_hrm_employee_quit_info b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id where year(b.plan_quit_time) = year(now()) and month(b.plan_quit_time) = month(now()) and a.entry_status = 3)

and a.employee_id in (select a.employee_id from wk_hrm_employee a left join wk_hrm_employee_quit_info b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id where year(b.plan_quit_time) = year(now()) and month(b.plan_quit_time) = month(now()) and a.entry_status = 3)
and a.employee_id in (select employee_id from wk_hrm_employee_contract where year(end_time) = year(now()) and month(end_time) = month(now()) group by employee_id)
and a.employee_id in (select employee_id from wk_hrm_employee where status = 2 and year(become_time) = year(now()) and month(become_time) = month(now()) group by employee_id)
and a.employee_id in (select employee_id from wk_hrm_employee where year(entry_time) = year(now()) and month(entry_time) = month(now()) and entry_status = 2)
